The '''Falls of Sirion''' were the mighty thundering falls of the River [[Sirion]].  Formed at the southernmost end of the [[Aelin-uial]], its base drained to flow under the hills of the [[Andram]] for three leagues before emerging again at the [[Gates of Sirion]].<ref>{{S|Beleriand}}</ref>
